global_caption: A scene featuring a man wearing a white short-sleeved shirt, reddish-brown pants, and black shoes, with a watch on his left hand and black sunglasses, holding a big map; a female with long hair in a white, short-sleeved, flowery patterned shirt, short jeans, and black sandals, holding a brown passport and carrying a blue carriage; a man in a green short-sleeved t-shirt, reddish-brown pants, and black shoes, with his two hands in his pant's pockets; and a female in a blue sleeveless dress and brown sandals, taking photos with a camera held in her left hand while holding a big straw hat in her right hand.
region_captions: A man is wearing a white short-sleeved shirt, reddish-brown pants, and black shoes. He has a watch on his left hand and is wearing black sunglasses, holding a map.
A female with long hair is wearing a white, short-sleeved, flowery patterned shirt, short jeans, and black sandals while holding a brown passport, carrying a carriage.
A man is wearing a green short-sleeved t-shirt, reddish-brown pants, and black shoes, putting his two hands in his pant's pockets.
A female is wearing a blue sleeveless dress and brown sandals, taking photos with a camera held in her left hand, and holding a big straw hat in her right hand.
